summary:
Add 4 Followers, 2 Versions Simple Version or Full Version. Choose One file
Sorry, Full Version is for Japanese only. For English users, Kaliban71 gave me to translate the full version in English
URL:http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75518
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6]MashiraFollowers vol.1.5[/size]
[size=3]by TESVOsaru[/size]
[color=#ff0000][size=5]
[/size][/color][color=#ff0000][size=5]2016.7.2 Starting CBBE support[/size][/color]


[size=6]ADD new Hair style
[/size][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/74807-1-1465202352.jpg[/img]
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/74807-0-1465202352.jpg[/img]
[size=4][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/74807-0-1465270395.jpg[/img][/size]
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/74807-1-1465270395.jpg[/img]

[size=6]New Functions of v1.5[/size]
[size=3][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/74807-0-1463891639.jpg[/img][/size]
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/74807-0-1464880253.jpg[/img][size=3]
[/size]
[size=5]Changelog:[/size]
[size=5]Full version 1.5[/size]
[size=4]●Additional Function make Jimi to sing the song （Read Readme）
●Add a dialogue to maintain the transformed state of UltimateMikan. ※ Please use in such as SS shooting
●Changes to the head parts from equipped with a bunny ear of UTMikan. This only ear even take off clothes to the beat of something became like remain. I had forgotten to write after but comes with a fang in UTMikan[/size]from per v1.1.[/center][center][size=4]●Additional dedicated summoning magic to UTMikan. Of twins Doremora-lord, now way she can summon Aniki and Aneki.

●One type add an animal that Nana can be summoned.[/size]

[size=5]Full version 1.2.1
Fix the deficiencies of the eye of the texture of UTMikan
Please download and apply the update data or v1.2.1[/size]

V1.2fixplus
[color=#ff0000][size=5]Fixed a bug in the display of hair.
[/size][/color][color=#ff0000][size=5]Sorry, people who download v1.2 or earlier, you are requested to download again
[/size][/color]Ver1.2:
Fixed facegendata everyone (remained unwanted hair nodes, eyes subsurface map has not been applied),
Jimi did not like too much Jimi Hendrix I tried a little fake(I tried!)
rework of face data of Mikan (slightly larger the nose)
After that, there is a little bit of additional elements to the full version. For more information, please read the ReadMe

FullVer1.11 Add Ultimate Mikan dialogue to cancel Mikan's transform.
Fix ArmorAddon of UTMikan's outfit (sorry, Skin textures were not displayed correctly, Because I made mistakes race setting in ver1.1)[/center][center])
FullVer1.1,Add Jimi's new shout "WarCry",It gives you more damage rate of your attack.
Fix Ultimate Mikan's race setting, Not to wear another equipment. For example, You use "Wet and Cold"

Simplever1.02,Fix Mikan & Nana texuers

ver1.01,Fix facegendata and remove disused textures

[size=4]Sorry! Full version of this MOD is  for Japanese Only!
[/size][size=4]I'm trying to translate esp and readme into English But It will be late.
Because I am Not good at English.[/size]

[color=#ff0000][size=5]Kaliban71 gave me to translate the full version in English
[/size][/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75518][size=6]MashiraFollowersV2 EV[/size][/url][color=#ff0000][size=5]
[/size][/color][size=4]
[/size][size=5]1, What is this MOD:[/size]
Add 4 Followers, 2 Versions you can download. Simple Version or Full Version, Choose One file

[size=4]Simple version:[/size] 
It Add 4 simple follower (male 1, female 3). you can marry three of them.
they are standalone follower (excepting Jimi),
You don't need another MOD to install my MOD

[size=4]Full version:[/size]
[size=2]
[/size][b]required for all DLC, SKSE and [/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14884]Fuz Ro D-oh - Silent Voice[/url][size=2]
[/size]Read "ReadMe_JP" in the file


[size=5]Follower1: Erika[/size]
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/74807-2-1460095976.jpg[/img]
Race:Breton  Age:Late 20s  Sex:Female  Class:Assassin 
She is here: Riften Ragged Flagon


[size=5]Follower2: Mikan[/size]
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/74807-1-1460095976.jpg[/img]
Race:Nord Age:Early 20s Sex:Female Class:Spellsword
She is here: Winterhold Frozen Hearth

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/74807-0-1460095976.jpg[/img]
[size=3](Full version only)Ultimate Mikan: Mikan transforms into Half-Deadric-witch  in a pinch.[/size]


[size=5]Follower3: Jimi gro Hendrix (Jimi)[/size]
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/74807-3-1460095976.jpg[/img]
Race:Orc Age:About 20s Sex:Male Class:Tank
He is here:Solitude entrance of Bards College

[size=5]Follower4: Nana[/size]
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/74807-4-1460095976.jpg[/img]
Race:Nord Age:8 ~ 10?(same age as vanilla child) Sex:Female Class:Blacksmith(She don't attack anyone)    
※You Can Not Marry Her (I'm obvious).
Only Full version, you can adopt her, and you can take her your journey as your follower after adoption. [/center][center][size=2]For More information, [/size]Read Readme_JP 
She is here: Whiterun Jorvaskr Basement



[size=5]2, Install and Uninstall
[/size][size=4]I recommend to use MO or NMM[/size]


[size=5]3, Credit
[/size][size=4]I used these MODs as resources to make my MOD
[/size][size=4]thanks all MODDERs  give me permission to use there MOD
